title: The Last Incantation
description: This anthology gathers a number of shortstories written by the acclaimed master of Science Fantasy anf Horror, Clark Ashton Smith. Among the stories you'll find; The Double Shadow, The Death of Malygris, The Ice Demon, The Devotee of Evil and many many more.Contents:IntroductionThe Double ShadowThe Last IncantationThe Death of MalygrisSeedling of MarsThe Ice-DemonUbbo-SathlaThe Plutonian DrugThe Colossus of YlourgneThe Holiness of AzedaracThe End of the StoryThe Vaults of Yoh-VombisThe Devotee of EvilThe Root of AmpoiGenius Loci
author: Clark Ashton Smith
